frontmatter.title: What is Tonisity Px
frontmatter.description: A new breakthrough technology to help pigs thrive as they transition through key milestones. Tonisity Px is an isotonic, highly palatable liquid solution that pigs will drink voluntarily, as early as Day 2 of life.
frontmatter.productBenefits: Tonisity Px results in higher returns on investment for participating pig producers. Ongoing research across the globe continues to add to our growing database of research and innovation. To request a copy of the science behind Tonisity Px, please contact Mr. Mark Eisenhart at meisenhart@tonisity.com.
frontmatter.productBody: With a taste profile pigs crave, Px provides the intestinal support and hydration needed to get them off to a fast, healthy start. From Day 2, Tonisity Px can be used in farrowing as well as nursery settings.

frontmatter.title: What is Tonisity PxW?
frontmatter.description: Start Fast, Drive Intake, Race to Profits.
frontmatter.productBenefits: Easy to use, water soluble formula, administered by water medicator system.
frontmatter.productBody: Tonisity PxW is a new product for 2020, that is designed to be delivered through water medicators and helps weaned pigs start fast in nurseries and wean to finish barns.
